meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #2031.

td.p: Tom Anderson, a graduate student from Provo, Utah
Barbara Elstein, a city planner from Brooklyn, New York
Bernie Shearon, an attorney from Dunwoody, Georgia (whose 2-day cash winnings total $33,200)

tr.td: THE PLANETS
ACTORS ONSTAGE
COLORS
GEOGRAPHY
GROCERIES
ODDS & ENDS

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'In 1836 Van Buren ran against Harrison for U.S. president & these 2 ran for president of Texas')

tr.td: 19th CENTURY ELECTIONS
In 1836 Van Buren ran against Harrison for U.S. president & these 2 ran for president of Texas
Bernie
Barbara
Tom
3rd place: Meade Instruments telescope
New champion: $13,200
2nd place: Trip to St. Thomas, U.S. Virgin Islands
Bernie
Barbara
Tom

(including 2 DDs),
